nodes.text: Shadow Number Two was the name given to a hole carved in the solar wind of the Rapacc system by one of its two gas giants. When entering the Rapacc system during a mission investigating two ill-fated Paccosh refugee starships, Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss Ascendancy intended for his Springhawk and Admiral Ar'alani's Vigilant to utilize both Shadow Number One and Number Two to bypass the nature of the box system.
